title: Default Health Group
body:
### Description

We are currently splitting of health checks because a certain part only concerns departement A and the other part only concerns departement B. I thought this would be done easily with the `@HealthGroup`. And actually, it is. There is only one thing that really bugs me. 

We already have an X amount of existing health checks that only concerns departement A. a new health check now only concerns dep B.

I now need to go ahead an annotate all existing HealthChecks with group "A" and the new one with group "B".

Therefor, it would be great to be able to define a default health group with a property like `quarkus.health.defaulthealthgroup=myDefaultGroup` which would cause, that all health checks which are not specifically annotated with `HealthGroup` are automatically registered with the default health group.
